Jemaah Umrah Marbut dan Majelis Taklim DKI Tiba di Madinah
05 Nov 2019, 05:01 by Kanavino Ahmad Rizqo
Madinah - Kloter keenam jemaah umrah marbut dan majelis taklim DKI Jakarta tiba di Jeddah, Arab Saudi. Jemaah langsung pergi menuju Madinah.
Rombongan marbut dan majelis taklim DKI tiba di Bandara King Abdul Aziz, Jeddah, Senin (4/10/2019) pukul 17.30 waktu setempat. Jemaah disambut pendamping ibadah umrah dan diarahkan untuk masuk bus.
Setelah itu, rombongan meluncur ke Madinah. Rombongan sempat berhenti di tengah perjalanan untuk menunaikan salat.


Marbut dan majelis taklim DKI tiba di Madinah. (Foto: Kanavino/detikcom)

Bus melaju lagi. Jarak Jeddah-Madinah ditempuh kurang lebih 5 jam.
Suasana haru menyelimuti para marbut dan majelis taklim saat bus memasuki Madinah. Pembimbing umrah mengisahkan tentang perjalanan hidup Rasulullah SAW saat di Madinah. Rombongan pun melafalkan salawat.
Sesampainya di hotel, marbut dan majelis taklim langsung masuk ke kamarnya masing-masing. Beberapa di antara mereka merencanakan untuk menghabiskan malam di Masjid Nabawi.
Hari pertama di Madinah, jemaah akan melakukan sejumlah rangkaian kegiatan. Kegiatan diawali Salat Subuh di Masjid Nabawi.


Marbut dan majelis taklim DKI tiba di Madinah. (Foto: Kanavino/detikcom)

Setelah itu rombongan bersiap ke Roudah dan makam Rasulullah SAW dan sahabat serta ziarah ke pemakaman Baqi. Setelah Salat Asar, marbut dan majelis taklim direncanakan mengunjungi Masjid Ghumamah, Masjid Abu Bakar, Masjid Umar dan Pasar Kurma. Kegiatan diakhiri dengan Salat Maghrib dan Salat Isya di Masjid Nabawi.
Para marbut dan majelis taklim DKI ini diberangkatkan umrah melalui dana hibah Pemprov DKI Jakarta ke Dewan Masjid Indonesia (DMI) Provinsi DKI Jakarta. Total 432 orang marbut dan pengurus majelis taklim beserta pendamping jemaah yang diberangkatkan umrah pada tahun ini.

The Marbut Umrah congregation and the DKI Taklim Council Arrived in Medina
05 Nov 2019, 05:01 by Kanavino Ahmad Rizqo
Madinah - The sixth group of Umrah marbut congregants and the DKI Jakarta taklim assembly arrived in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia. The congregation went straight to Medina.
The group of marbut and DKI taklim assemblies arrived at King Abdul Aziz Airport, Jeddah, Monday (4/10/2019) at 17:30 local time. Congregations were welcomed by Umrah worship companions and directed to enter the bus.
After that, the group drove to Medina. The group stopped in the middle of the journey to offer prayers.


Marbut and DKI taklim assemblies arrived in Medina. (Photo: Kanavino / detikcom)

The bus drove again. The distance between Jeddah and Medina is approximately 5 hours.
The atmosphere of emotion enveloped the marbut and majelis taklim when the bus entered Medina. The Umrah guide tells about the journey of life of the Prophet when he was in Medina. The group also recited salawat.
Arriving at the hotel, Marbut and the Taklim Assembly immediately entered their respective rooms. Some of them planned to spend the night at the Prophet's Mosque.
The first day in Medina, the congregation will conduct a number of series of activities. The activity began with the Fajr Prayer at the Nabawi Mosque.


Marbut and DKI taklim assemblies arrived in Medina. (Photo: Kanavino / detikcom)

After that the group prepared to go to Roudah and the tomb of the Prophet Muhammad and his best friends and pilgrimage to the Baqi cemetery. After the Asar Prayer, the marbut and majelis taklim are planned to visit the Ghumamah Mosque, the Abu Bakar Mosque, the Umar Mosque and the Kurma Market. The activity ended with Maghrib Prayer and Isha Prayer at the Nabawi Mosque.
The marbut and DKI taklim assemblies were dispatched umrah through DKI Jakarta Provincial Government grant funds to the DKI Jakarta Provincial Mosque Council (DMI). A total of 432 marbut people and the management of the taklim assembly along with the accompanying pilgrims departed for the Umrah this year.
